column4: What is the difference between the lines, ... lucid and ... lucid-updates in /etc/apt/sources.list
one is for the "lucid" repository and the other is for "lucid-updates"
so if I remove lucid-updates I will never move past the release I've installed from?
whether or not you remove it, you will never end up on a different release unless you tell ubuntu you want to upgrade your release.  lucid-updates provides updates to fix software issues
